data.title: Bitcoin mining news: ABTC shares plunge, miners face breakeven costs, IREN prices $3.6B offering
data.description: This week in bitcoin mining news, an American Bitcoin share unlock tumbles the ABTC price, and IREN eyes the largest capital raise ever for a bitcoin miner.
data.keywords: IREN, bitcoin mining, American Bitcoin, ABTC, Greenidge Generation
